ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: Yara Alzahid acknowledges the graduate fellowship provided by Saudi Aramco. The authors also acknowledge the South Australian node of the Australian National Fabrication Facility under the National Collaborative Research Infrastructure Strategy for making the silicon mould and the Microfluidics laboratoryÂ at the School of Mechanical and Manufacturing Engineering at UNSW for their support with generating the PDMS micromodels.
